awards:
第57届美国声音效果协会奖(2021)
　　非虚构类电视节目最佳音效(提名)

director.name: 艾莉森·埃尔伍德 Alison Ellwood

this_title: Laurel Canyon: A Place in Time
introduction: Documentary pulls back the curtain on a mythical world and provides an up-close look at the lives of the musicians who inhabited Laurel Canyon. It paints an intimate portrait of the artists who created a music revolution that would change popular culture.
chinese_title: Laurel Canyon: A Place in Time
